head.supplied: 26/3/92 ¶ ¶ I shall be very thankful, dear Mr Holtze, if you will give me a full account of the two Livistona Fan-palms near you, as regards their differences, which characteristics may alter accordi...

div.p: GRG 19/391, State Records of South Australia, Adelaide.

I shall be very thankful, dear Mr Holtze, if you will give me a full account of the two Livistona Fan-palms near you, as regards their differences, which characteristics may alter according to their state of age. Have you any reason to suppose, that Sida Holtzei
See N. Holtze to M, 7 March 1892. could be immigrated? As you are such an excellent observer, I like you to watch the real specific differences of the 3 Buechneras also there. For the third likely the collective name B. Browniana (Schinz) will have to be adopted. You may imagine, that it requires in all these instances much time to dissect material from dried specimens to fix safely the diagnoses of the species. I hope you will be able after some few years to publish a full list of the plants of your region.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Best thanks for the small bulbs just received.
